title: GHOSTRIDER 5 - back to basics (extended)
description:
[img]http://img02.picoodle.com/img/img02/4/4/14/f_jzef89m_bc8deb7.jpg[/img]


All gearheads know who Ghostrider is by now, but for those of you who don?t know, Ghostrider is a Swedish motorcyclist who with the help of his crew films himself illegally racing and pissing the cops off. A Ghostrider film hasn?t been released since 2005 so this is quite a major release. Everyone should give this a watch since this guy is such an awesome driver its crazy! Apparently there are more police chases in this one than ever before which sounds awesome so   Enjoy! 8) 

TRAILER
